A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: From start to finish this movie is fun\, funny\, entertaining and emotionally relevant. Some of the action sequences are stunningly original\, and there are scenes which will undoubtedly go down as among the most classic and quintessential to series lore. Well acted\, and suprisingly so by Hamil in particular. Also\, new characters are introduced so well\, they enrich the story and leave you wanting to know what's next.
